subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp
author: Jody Cupp
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00BE_01C68F03.7C10AFA0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You must ask for only messages for your highest good and for your state of =
development.  I rarely get mean spirits around me.When I do I stand up and =
they don't come back.  You are always in control!! :)


  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: Amy Swanson 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tu=
esday, June 13, 2006 3:55 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp



  well your ri=
ght, its not that i havent payed attention per say, more taht i refused to =
see them, hear them, feel them <except those few that really push the limit=
s come through anyway! lol <like the mean one that lived in my closet>
  I =
was reading about "signs" of entities around you and happenings  and it see=
ms that i have been a hotel and hitchhiker picker upper ROFL all my life fo=
r them, I have just ignored them forever. Now i have wanted to see hear and=
 talk to them but i dont feel very successfull, but then im NOT a patient p=
erson lol

  Amy

  Jody Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote:
    For me Amy, it=
's been about establishing a relationship with those I can not always see.
=

    I differ with your point of view about a door being open or closed. Un=
less you take it as you're starting to pay attention more to your surroundi=
ngs, in my oppinion they are always there, always have been, but you didn't=
 take notice.  Once you start to take notice, ask them for help etc, then t=
he evps and answers to your questions will come.  I also suspect that there=
 is a building type situation going on that would make it easier for them t=
o communicate with you. I have seen the ecto in the shape of horns going in=
to my computer, which is substancial to me when the voices change.  It's al=
l about energy.  We are energy they are energy everything in this world is =
energy, we just need to learn to harness it and use it to get what we want.=
  look around your home.  do you see horizontal lights? do you see orbs? if=
 not thats okay, it will happen as you learn to notice things that you've b=
een too busy to see.

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Amy S=
wanson 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 20=
06 3:35 PM
      Subject: [EVP-ITC] evp


      well if yall are very expie=
reinced in this, i just started doing evp's a few weeks ago!
      I know t=
hat these folks have been around me and some are where i live. the first ti=
me i did an evp i got nothing till the 3rd time. Then its seems that it ope=
ned a door for them, they are conversing amongst themselves saying hello to=
 each other, that they can see, they can see the computer, one of them said=
 he was beseiged. I didnt record again till yesterday, and i kinda wonder i=
f they are mad? i kept getting vibes to record but have been to tired with =
moving. Can they get mad with you? i assume they can. When i recorded, i ha=
ve been using microsoft word and typing my questions, and a little bit of t=
alking too, if they can see the computer <so they said> why not?! I also us=
ed this thing from EVP maker that shows pictures and makes clicks and tones=
. The only thing they had to say was "watch" watch", wether they ment to no=
t say anything and just watch m e or refering to some of the questions i ha=
d, i dont know, cant assume anything lol. What can i do to get them to talk=
 to me more? Answer questions? like no one has indentified themselves and i=
 would really like to know who they are. I have a few people i would like t=
o talk to that have passed over. However anyone is nice lol. I just would l=
ike to open this door MORE now, that i have closed off. I think that I open=
ed a doorway for them but i want to interact more! People have been referin=
g to me as a "sensitive"? I assume meaning that i am able to tell if they a=
re here etc. Which i usually can. Is it possible that because in the past f=
or the most part i have kept this part of me closed off, except those entit=
ies that refuse to be silenced come through, that they are skeptical of tal=
king to me? That i cant handle it?

      Anyway, justthought id talk with =
somemore people who have "been there done that"
      I would like to have =
someone over who has alot of history and do an evp in my home and talk to t=
hem for me. <sigs>

      Amy




      http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-I=
TC/

      LON3_S7AR  YAHOO MESENGER ID
      _____________________________=
_____________________

      Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail=
 has the best spam protection around
